member.summary: The goods is available for sale to customers.

member.name: F:Ajka.Common.Enums.ItemCardEnums.ItemCardState.Sold
member.summary: The goods is sold and will be never offered for sale again.

member.name: F:Ajka.Common.Enums.ItemCardEnums.ItemCardState.Inactive
member.summary: Item is hidden from eshop offer, but can be anytime returned to sale.

member.summary: Order is just created by customer and waits for administrator to process.

member.name: F:Ajka.Common.Enums.OrderEnums.OrderState.WaitingForPayment
member.summary: The customer has received payment instructions and is awaiting payment.

member.name: F:Ajka.Common.Enums.OrderEnums.OrderState.Closed

member.name: F:Ajka.Common.Enums.OrderEnums.OrderState.Cancellation
